bibl.title: The postal register of Turbo, curator of the praesidium of Xeron Pelagos
bibl.seg: Hélène Cuvigny, The postal register of Turbo, curator of the praesidium of Xeron Pelagos.
Hélène Cuvigny, Rome in Egypt's Eastern Desert. Edited with an introduction by Roger S. Bagnall = ISAW Monographs. Vol. 1 (New York, 2021) pp. 267-298, figg.

Traduit de: Le livre de poste de Turbo, curateur du praesidium de Xèron Pelagos (Aegyptus), dans: Anne Kolb (ed.), Roman Roads. New Evidence - New Perspectives (Berlin - Boston, 2019) pp. 67-105, figg.
